aw://a157a30cd05bdacd97d3e1d10dae9b8fb0272033ad74ff3a36c36f2407b6eff8","dweb:/ipfs/QmUnnHLnUvEpb8zviNPnEspjfzYwU5PMj6xYbwDiTkzWZk"]},"src/vAMM.sol":{"keccak256":"0x27c018110aaa6d33cc18db83dc4d2bfa0143bbde31c3be858dae5b7e76c0fd87","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2937f31f730e591e3037a579fa57c0904a088ca68a96a91dba7f762f07c7df53","dweb:/ipfs/QmS6KKuiwBEDrrYd5xyvEAiCHxbqkQbqub1s4YgTC6j1uW"]}},"version":1}

cumulativeFundingPerUnitX18().details: Clearinghouse snapshots this value to calculate per-trader funding payments.

feeGrowthGlobalX128().details: Consumers can use this alongside their liquidity share to compute realized protocol fees.

getLiquidity().details: This value does not affect pricing and is only used to index protocol fee accumulation per unit liquidity.

getMarkPrice().details: Mark price is computed as quote reserve divided by base reserve in 1e18 precision.

getSqrtPriceX96().details: Converts the 1e18 mark price into a Q96 value by scaling before taking the square root.

getTick().details: vAMM emulates constant product pricing with no discrete ticks, so this always returns zero.

params.window: Number of seconds to look back; defaults to configured observationWindow when zero.

returns._0: twapX18 TWAP mark price in 1e18 precision.

params.paused: True to pause swaps, false to resume.

pokeFunding().details: Funding rate is clamped by frMaxBpsPerHour and accumulated into _cumulativeFundingPerUnitX18.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

setLiquidity(uint128).details: Restricted to the owner; reverts if set to zero.

params.newOracle: Address of the oracle contract; must not be zero.

params.feeBps_: New trade fee in basis points (max 1%).
params.frMaxBpsPerHour_: Maximum allowed funding rate drift per hour in basis points.
params.observationWindow_: Default TWAP lookback window in seconds.

params.newOwner: Address of the new owner; must not be zero.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

cumulativeFundingPerUnitX18().notice: Returns the cumulative funding index per unit position size.

feeGrowthGlobalX128().notice: Returns the global fee growth accumulator scaled by 2^128.

getLiquidity().notice: Returns the virtual liquidity scalar used for fee growth accounting.

getMarkPrice().notice: Returns the instantaneous mark price derived from the current virtual reserves.

getReserves().notice: Returns the current virtual base and quote reserves used for pricing.

getSqrtPriceX96().notice: Exposes the current sqrt price in Uniswap V3 Q96 format for integrations and diagnostics.

getTick().notice: Returns the current tick for compatibility with AMM style interfaces.

getTwap(uint32).notice: Computes the time-weighted average mark price over a lookback window.

pauseSwaps(bool).notice: Toggles the swap execution flag, enabling or disabling all trading through the vAMM.

pokeFunding().notice: Updates the cumulative funding index using the latest TWAP and oracle index prices.

setClearinghouse(address).notice: Updates the clearinghouse contract authorized to interact with the vAMM.

setLiquidity(uint128).notice: Updates the virtual liquidity scalar used for fee growth accounting.

setOracle(address).notice: Sets the oracle used to retrieve index prices for funding calculations.

setParams(uint16,uint256,uint256,uint32).notice: Updates core trading and funding parameters for the vAMM.

swapBaseForQuote(uint128,uint256).notice: Buy base (receive base) by paying quote; slippage uses max acceptable price.

swapQuoteForBase(uint128,uint256).notice: Pay quote to receive base; slippage uses max acceptable price.

swapSellBaseForQuote(uint128,uint256).notice: Sell base (short/close long) by providing base notionally; returns executed deltas and average price.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers contract ownership to a new admin address.
